announcements.name: [TEMPORARY] HYPIXEL R/PLACE PROJECT
announcements.description: Hey! The Hypixel community is creating a logo on r/place along with Technoblade. Click here for more information

announcements.name: [July 18] SkyBlock Patch Notes
announcements.description: Hey all! We are here to inform you about the latest update that was just rolled to SkyBlock!

announcements.name: SkyBlock Patch 0.19.1 - Leveling and Bug Fixes
announcements.description: Hey Guys! SkyBlock has been updated to version 0.19.1. New features in this patch are Item Linking and several Leveling updates, as well as many other changes and bug fixes.
